channel.title: PR on Ramblings from Hao
channel.description: Recent content in PR on Ramblings from Hao

item.title: C Language Implementation for Proportional-Resonant Controller
item.description: 1. Introduction to Proportional-Resonant Controller First, let’s see the transfer function of PR controller and its bode diagram: $$ G_{PR}(s)=K_{p} + \frac{K_{r}s}{s^{2} + \omega_{r}^2} $$ where the $\omega_{r}$ is the resonant frequency. As can be seen in the bode diagram, the gain at 50Hz (314 rad/s) is infinite, so PR controller can be used to track reference of specific frequency. However, the reference frequency is not always a constant, e.
